summary: More than 200,000 companies provide supplies, parts, and manufacturing for DOD's weapon systems. Risks to this defense industrial base include materials shortages, reliance on foreign suppliers, and more. Various DOD offices and the military services monitor such risks and work to mitigate them. However, DOD doesn't have a robust strategy to mitigate risks or track progress department-wide. Visibility over its department-wide efforts could help DOD...
title: Defense Industrial Base: DOD Should Take Actions to Strengthen Its Risk Mitigation Approach
